mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into p_goods_exchange
goodsId,
voucherId,
`number`,
#{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{voucherId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update p_goods_exchange
goodsId = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
voucherId = #{voucherId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
`number` = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select e.id,e.goodsId,e.voucherId,e.number,v.voucherName from p_goods_exchange e left join p_voucher v on e.voucherId=v.id where e.goodsId = #{0}
